paper_keywords: Concurrent non-malleability with respect to opening
paper_abstract: We present a modular construction of non-malleable statistically hiding commitment schemes that retains its properties when concurrently executed a polynomial number of times. Our protocol is based on a statistically hiding commitment scheme and a concurrent non-malleable zero-knowledge protocol for all of NP. Our result is achieved in the plain model without relying on any set-up assumptions. The proof of security only uses black-box techniques. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
